Thanks in Advance 
  Parag

This scenario is not reproducible in RC1.

There was a defect if you  directly  invoke Create Enterprise Bean Wizard,
and then  choose New "New.." to create a EJB project, 
if this  is what you are doing  then i  suggest to create EJB project  first
and then add Enterprise bean to the project.

I am using WTPM5, Eclipse 3.1, and XDoclet 1.2.3, for ejb generation. And I 
am getting following Exception 
"java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException" 
while trying to create an EJB Project as per the Tutorial which is given at 
http://www.eclipse.org/webtools/testtutorials/M2/ejbtutorial/buildingejbs.html
 So, Please tell me What to do with this 
problem.

Is this the same error, the stack for which you have included?, 
did you use the workaround i mentioned?
At which step are you getting this error?

Yes, First I create the EJB project after that I am try to create an Session 
Bean, But while creating an Ejb project & it's client I am 
getting "java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException" this Exception so please 
tell me what to do to solve this problem, It's very Important for me.
And as said I am following steps given at 
http://www.eclipse.org/webtools/testtutorials/M2/ejbtutorial/buildingejbs.html
  Please Help Me & Suggest me some solution on that

Thanks in Advance

Yes, First I create the EJB project after that I am try to create an Session 
Bean, But while creating an Ejb project & it's client I am 
getting "java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException" this Exception so please 
tell me what to do to solve this problem, It's very Important for me.
And as said I am following steps given at 
http://www.eclipse.org/webtools/testtutorials/M2/ejbtutorial/buildingejbs.html
  Please Help Me & Suggest me some solution on that

Thanks in Advance
Upgarde to WTP RC1, this will fix your problem
